nodes.text: CT-80/88-3009, or A'den (pronounced AH-den), was a senior clone commander in command of the 7th Legion, a division of the 327th Star Corps. "A'den" was Mando'a for "rage"/"wrath".

Named by author Karen Traviss, it was the same name given to Null-class Advanced Recon Commando Sergeant N-12. This is to set up how coincidental names are chosen by troopers in the Grand Army, such as troopers with the last digit in their call sign being five, the trooper may take the name "Fi".
